fields.value: CFC-12 Data used for “Relationship of Academic Procrastination and Consideration of Future Consequences – An Empirical Study among University Students

authorAffiliation.value: VIT Business School, Vellore Institute of Technology, Chennai, India

datasetContactAffiliation.value: VIT Business School, Vellore Institute of Technology, Chennai, India

dsDescriptionValue.value: The data-set contains responses from 132 participants for the CFC-12 questionnaire (5 point likert scale) that I have used in my study on Consideration of Future Consequences among Engineering students at a Private University setup. Besides CFC, the data also includes Gender, Age, Nationality, and Educational level of the respondents.

keywordValue.value: Consideration for Future Consequences, CFC-12, Personality, College Students, India
